sentences.english: The hydrogen propulsion system will be the key to Phantom Eye's success.
sentences.chinese: 氫推進系統將是幻影眼成功的關鍵。

sentences.english: Osler, because yesterday is nothing but a dream, while the Tomorrow is just an illusion.
sentences.chinese: 因爲昨天不過是一場夢，而明天只是一個幻影。

sentences.english: He felt a bone-deep ache in his phantom fingers.
sentences.chinese: 從幻影手指上，傳來陣陣深及骨髓的痛。

sentences.english: Startles between greatly, Lv Liuliang's illusory image held the sword to rush comes, fights with him.
sentences.chinese: 大駭之間，呂留良的幻影已持劍衝上前來，與他搏鬥。

sentences.english: Almost 10 years ago, Osama bin Laden ghosted away from the Afghan battlefields.
sentences.chinese: 近10年前，烏薩馬本拉丹離開阿富汗幻影戰場。

sentences.english: Moonlight Senran, spirit temperament, everything is just a mirage, transient.
sentences.chinese: 月光的森然，樂律的精魂，一切只是幻影，稍縱即逝。

sentences.english: To-day is the festival of phantoms that know not when they die.
sentences.chinese: 本日是幻影的節日，他們不知道本身的死期。

sentences.english: Phantasmagoria portray the unspeakable , they rise above the written language.
sentences.chinese: 幻影描繪無法形容的事物，它超越了語言文字。

sentences.english: It is a place of disenchantment, a simulacrum of accumulation against death.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個沒有魅力的地方，對抗死亡的一個幻影。

sentences.english: FAW's HQD Concept is a scary-looking Chinese-style Rolls-Royce Phantom!
sentences.chinese: 一氣紅旗盛事是一款嚇人的中國版勞斯萊斯幻影。

sentences.english: People like her are in enraptured by war and its illusion of glory.
sentences.chinese: 人們喜歡她是在使狂喜藉着戰爭中和它的光榮幻影。

sentences.english: As a hard-core film geek, I've seen plenty of sci-fi posers.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個鐵桿電影迷，我看到過很多科幻影片。

sentences.english: We have just recalled it, everything was a vision to him now.
sentences.chinese: 我們剛纔已經提到，現在一切對他只是一種幻影。

sentences.english: The '09 Geely GE body design is no doubt a knock-off of the Rolls Royce Phantom.
sentences.chinese: 09款吉利GE的車身設計與勞斯萊斯幻影如出一轍。

sentences.english: The dragon edition will be available in both the regular Phantom model and the extended wheelbase Phantom model.
sentences.chinese: 常規的幻影車型及幻影加長車型都會推出龍年限量版。

sentences.english: The dragon edition will be available in both the regular Phantom model and the extended wheelbase Phantom model.
sentences.chinese: 常規的幻影車型及幻影加長車型都會推出龍年限量版。

definition: to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
